autoinfo.name: set_state_name
autoinfo.description: Changes the name of a state

autoinfo.name: set_province_name
autoinfo.description: Changes the name of a province

autoinfo.name: swap_ideas
autoinfo.description: Swaps two ideas, showing the difference

autoinfo.name: set_cosmetic_tag
autoinfo.description: Sets a cosmetic TAG for a country

autoinfo.name: create_unit
autoinfo.example: create_unit = { division = "name = COOL_NAME division_template = COOL_TEMPLATE starting_experience_factor = 1.0" }

autoinfo.name: set_autonomy
autoinfo.description: Sets the autonomy level of a target

autoinfo.name: add_to_tech_sharing_group
autoinfo.description: Adds a country to a tech sharing group

autoinfo.name: remove_from_tech_sharing_group
autoinfo.description: Removes a country from a tech sharing group

autoinfo.name: add_manpower
autoinfo.description: Adds manpower to a state or country

autoinfo.name: add_political_power
autoinfo.description: Adds political power to a country

autoinfo.name: add_state_core
autoinfo.description: Adds cores on a specified state

autoinfo.name: remove_building
autoinfo.description: Removes a specified building from a specified state or province

autoinfo.name: random_list
autoinfo.description: Chooses an effect randomly from a list based on their probabilities

autoinfo.name: white_peace
autoinfo.description: Creates a white peace between countries

autoinfo.name: add_opinion_modifier
autoinfo.description: Adds an opinion modifier to a country

autoinfo.name: remove_opinion_modifier
autoinfo.description: Removes an opinion modifer from a country

autoinfo.name: create_country_leader
autoinfo.params: Sub-Code (String, String, Date, Ideology ID, List of Trait ID)
autoinfo.description: Creates a country leader (head of state)
autoinfo.example: create_country_leader = { name = "Peter II" desc = "POLITICS_PETER_II_DESC" picture = "Portrait_Yugoslavia_Peter_II.dds" expire = "1965.1.1" ideology = despotism traits = { } }

autoinfo.name: division_template
autoinfo.params: Sub-Code (String, List of (Division type, Number Number))
autoinfo.description: Adds a division template to a country
autoinfo.example: division_template = { name = "Cool Name" regiments = { infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 } infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 } } }

autoinfo.name: set_country_leader_ideology
autoinfo.description: Changes the ideology of the current country leader

autoinfo.name: add_country_leader_trait
autoinfo.description: Add a trait to the current country leader

autoinfo.name: remove_country_leader_trait
autoinfo.description: Removes a trait from the current country leader

autoinfo.name: set_political_party
autoinfo.description: Sets the properties of a political party

autoinfo.name: set_politics
autoinfo.description: Changes the politics of a country

autoinfo.name: set_political_power
autoinfo.description: Sets political power to a certain value

autoinfo.name: set_technology
autoinfo.description: Set technology level of a country

autoinfo.name: create_navy_leader
autoinfo.params: Sub-Code (String, String, List of Trait ID, Number)
autoinfo.description: Creates a naval leader for a country
autoinfo.example: create_navy_leader = { name = "Boaty McBoatface" gfx = "GFX_BoatfacesFace" traits = { } skill = 3 }

autoinfo.name: remove_unit_leader_trait
autoinfo.description: Removes a trait from a unit leader

autoinfo.name: add_unit_leader_trait
autoinfo.description: Add a trait to a unit leader

autoinfo.name: set_state_owner
autoinfo.description: Sets the owner of a state

autoinfo.name: set_state_controller
autoinfo.description: Sets the controller of a state

autoinfo.name: transfer_state
autoinfo.description: Sets the owner and controller of a state

autoinfo.name: create_faction
autoinfo.description: Creates a faction with a specified name

autoinfo.name: add_building_construction
autoinfo.params: Sub-Code (Building Type, Province ID, Number, Yes or no)
autoinfo.description: Starts a building construction within a state or a province
autoinfo.example: 18 = { add_building_construction = { type = bunker province = 5291 level = 2 instant_build = yes } }

autoinfo.name: dismantle_faction
autoinfo.description: Dismantles the faction led by the current country

autoinfo.name: add_to_faction
autoinfo.description: Adds a country to a faction

autoinfo.name: remove_from_faction
autoinfo.description: Removes a country from a faction

autoinfo.name: give_military_access
autoinfo.description: Specified country gives military access (bugged tooltip)

autoinfo.name: declare_war_on
autoinfo.description: Declares war on a specified country

autoinfo.name: add_scaled_political_power
autoinfo.description: Adds political power scaled by the difference between ICs of receiver and another country

autoinfo.name: start_civil_war
autoinfo.description: Starts a civil war with the given ideology

autoinfo.name: retire_country_leader
autoinfo.description: Removes a country leader and replaces him with another candidate from the same party

autoinfo.name: add_claim_by
autoinfo.description: Add state claim by a country

autoinfo.name: remove_claim_by
autoinfo.description: Removes state claim from a country

autoinfo.name: add_core_of
autoinfo.description: Adds cores of a country to a state

autoinfo.name: remove_core_of
autoinfo.description: Removes cores of a country from a state

autoinfo.name: save_event_target_as
autoinfo.description: Save an event target as something

autoinfo.name: save_global_event_target_as
autoinfo.description: Save a global event target as something

autoinfo.name: unlock_national_focus
autoinfo.description: Unlocks a national focus for a country

autoinfo.name: set_demilitarized_zone
autoinfo.description: Sets a state as a demilitarized zone

autoinfo.name: add_research_slot
autoinfo.description: Adds set number of research slots

autoinfo.name: set_research_slots
autoinfo.description: Sets the number of research slots

autoinfo.name: set_national_unity
autoinfo.description: Sets the national unity of a country

autoinfo.name: set_equipment_fraction
autoinfo.description: Gives a fraction of your equipment to another country

autoinfo.name: send_equipment
autoinfo.example: send_equipment = { target = FIN type = infantry_equipment amount = 500 }

autoinfo.name: set_rule
autoinfo.description: Sets a rule to a country

autoinfo.name: diplomatic_relation
autoinfo.description: Set up diplomatic relations between two countries

autoinfo.name: add_resource
autoinfo.description: Adds resource production to a state

autoinfo.name: add_timed_idea
autoinfo.description: Adds a time limited idea to a country

autoinfo.name: end_puppet
autoinfo.description: Ends puppetry over the specified country

autoinfo.name: create_import
autoinfo.example: create_import = { resource = steel amount = 20 exporter = SWE }

autoinfo.name: create_field_marshal
autoinfo.params: Sub-Code (String, String, List of Trait ID, Number)
autoinfo.example: create_field_marshal = { name = "Dude McCoolDude" gfx = "GFX_CoolDudesFace" traits = { } skill = 3 }

autoinfo.name: create_corps_commander
autoinfo.params: Sub-Code (String, String, List of Trait ID, Number)
autoinfo.example: create_corps_commander = { name = "Dude McCoolDude" gfx = "GFX_CoolDudesFace" traits = { } skill = 3 }

autoinfo.name: set_party_name
autoinfo.params: Sub-Code (Ideaology Type, Localisation Key, Localisation Key)
autoinfo.description: Changes a party name of a country
autoinfo.example: set_party_name = { ideology = democratic long_name = USA_republican_party name = USA_republican_party }

autoinfo.name: add_extra_state_shared_building_slots
autoinfo.description: Add extra building slots to a state

autoinfo.name: create_equipment_variant
autoinfo.params: Sub-Code (String, Equipment Type, List of Upgrade)
autoinfo.example: create_equipment_variant = { name = "Montecuccoli Class" type = light_cruiser_1 upgrades = { ship_reliability_upgrade = 3 ship_engine_upgrade = 3 ship_gun_upgrade = 3 ship_anti_air_upgrade = 3 }}

autoinfo.name: add_equipment_production
autoinfo.example: add_equipment_production = { equipment = { type = light_cruiser_1 creator = "ITA" version_name = "Montecuccoli Class" } requested_factories = 1 progress = 0.95 amount = 1 }

autoinfo.name: add_ace
autoinfo.params: Sub-Code (String, String, String, Ace Type, Yes or no)
autoinfo.example: add_ace = { name = "Amelia" surname = "Earhart" callsign = "Revenant" type = fighter_genius is_female = yes }

autoinfo.name: add_equipment_to_stockpile
autoinfo.description: Adds equipment to stockpile of the country in question
autoinfo.example: add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = convoy_1 amount = 50 producer = TAG }
